column4: Any idea why UNetBootin and LiLo aren't making my USB device bootable?
I get stuck at the "SYSLINUX 4.03 2010-10-22 EDD Copyright..." page
Thanks Willis, I'll try Universal USB Installer.

If other tools fail it's probably an issue with Syslinux (specific to your hardare and likely due to a bug in your firmware rather than a bug in Syslinux). Because of that 1: You might get better help in #syslinux and 2: You might be able to make something which boots on your machine by using GRUB instead of Syslinux.
